problem_text:
19.15. For a class of groups M, let L(M) denote the class of all groups G in which the normal closure ⟨aG⟩ of any element a ∈ G is contained in M. Let qA be the quasivariety generated by a finite nilpotent group A. Can the quasivariety L(qA) contain a non-nilpotent group?
A. I. Budkin
